CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 教；教授；讲授；指导；教育；训练；启发；传授知识；使理解；使明白；担任教师职务；引导；诱导
<非正式>教育工作者；教师；讲师；导师；教授；指导者

word_mean_info__list.difference: 与teach含义很接近，但语体较正式。指系统、详细、精心地传播知识，侧重教授与指示。
指对个人或小组等进行辅导、训练或补课。
指进行个别教学或课外辅导。
最普通用词，含义广泛。指直接教某人知识或技能等，侧重传播知识和帮助应用知识。
较正式用词，指教育，内容比teach广泛，侧重动机或结果，或对潜在能力的开发。

word_group.phrase: teach one's grandmother to suck eggs

word_group.brief_definition: 没法让老狗学新把戏；很难让人们改变他们的方式
word_group.phrase: you can't teach an old dog new tricks

bilingual.source: The school needs help to teach music.
Teach tea by holding up the teabag.
Teach building and suitcase with the flashcards.
bilingual.target: 用闪卡教建筑和行李箱。

bilingual.source: Which promises to teach you how to do something?
bilingual.target: 哪个承诺教你如何做某事？

bilingual.source: Kate is from England and she can teach me English.
bilingual.target: 凯特来自英格兰，她可以教我英语。

bilingual.source: I'm going to teach him the Chinese song "Jasmine Flower"!
bilingual.target: 我要教他中文歌曲《茉莉花》！

bilingual.source: Teach fire, burgers, sleeping bag and village with the flashcards.
bilingual.target: 用闪卡教火、汉堡、睡袋和村庄。

list.abstract: teach（英[tiːtʃ]，美[tiːtʃ]），英语单词，作动词为教；教会；教书。作名词为教师。短语搭配有teach a lesson（教训某人一顿）。例句为“It is being utilised to teach native languages.（它正被用来教授母语。）” teach动词类近义词有wise、enlighten。第三人称单数为teaches。现在分词为teaching。过去式为taught。过去分词为taught。

yingyinNormal.en: He teach History, English or Math?
yingyinNormal.zh: 他教历史、英语还是数学？

yingyinNormal.en: I didn't want to teach those poopy heads, anyway.
yingyinNormal.zh: 反正我也不想教那群榆木脑袋了。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on they're the Five. What can I teach them?
yingyinNormal.zh: 别闹了，他们可是盖世五侠，我能教他们什么呀？

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, or you can teach him a lesson.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你也可以给他一个教训。

yingyinNormal.en: Then teach me how to See. No one can teach you to See.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那就教我怎么用心体会。没人能教会你。

yingyinNormal.en: What? I can't teach you kung fu. I couldn't even teach Tigress. And she already knows kung fu.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？我教不了你功夫，我连娇虎都教不了，而她还是功夫高手。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, if I'm like a child, then, look, maybe you should teach me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，如果我是小孩，你是不是可以教教我？

yingyinNormal.en: I can teach you, son. You can do this? Of course, I'm a panda.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可以教你，儿子。你可以教我？当然，我是只熊猫。

yingyinNormal.en: Interesting. I suppose if someone could teach sign language to KoKo the gorilla, I could teach you some rudimentary physics.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有意思，既然别人能教KoKo大猩猩学手语，我也能教你基本物理学。

yingyinNormal.en: You should teach us future class, you know, give us something we could use.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你该教我们未来课你懂的，教我们些有用的东西。

yingyinNormal.en: I am not gonna teach you guys about the '60s. Yay. You are. Yay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不再教你们六十年代的历史了。太好了。你们来教自己。真好。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you want me to teach you? I'm a great teacher.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要我教你吗？我是个很好的老师。

yingyinNormal.en: I will show him how to paint a flower. George, today I'm going to teach you how to paint a flower.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会教乔治如何画小花。乔治，我今天要教你怎么去画一朵小花。

yingyinNormal.en: But you don't even know kung fu. Then you will teach us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但你们都不会功夫啊。你可以教我们啊。

yingyinNormal.en: I came home early because they ran out of math to teach me. Oh, now I'm with you. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我提早回家，因为他们已经没有能教我的数学了。我懂，他们也没有能教我的数学。

yingyinNormal.en: Why can't Leonard teach you? 'Cause I want to surprise him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 干嘛不叫莱纳德教你？我想给他个惊喜。

yingyinNormal.en: Rearview mirrors. We'll get you some, and I'll teach you if you want.
yingyinNormal.zh: 反光镜，我会给你装一个，你想学我会教你

yingyinNormal.en: And so you know we made a deal that's he's going to teach me all sorts of jock stuff.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们说好了，他要教我各种运动。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait, aren't you gonna teach us first? I believe in learning on the job.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，你不先教我们吗? 我相信实战教学。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, Joey, I could teach you to sail if you want. You could?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你要的话，我可以教你驾驶帆船。你会驾驶帆船？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 教学工作；教职；教学；讲授；教导；学说；教义
n. 教师；老师；先生；导师；教员

word_family.mean: v. 教；教会；教书；讲授；提倡；宣扬；训导；当教师；诱导；使明白

sense_info_list.en: show or explain to someone how to do something

examination_example.sentence: Failure can also <highlight>teach</highlight> us things about ourselves that we would never have learned otherwise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 失败也能让我们了解自己，否则我们永远不会了解自己。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>taught</highlight> himself shorthand to get an even better job later as a court stenographer and as a reporter in Parliament.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了得到一份更好的工作，他自学了速记，后来成为了法庭速记员和国会记者。

examination_example.sentence: They could have <highlight>taught</highlight> at their universities, worked in their hospitals and come up with clever new products for their factories to make.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们本可以在他们的大学教书，在他们的医院工作，并为他们的工厂制造出巧妙的新产品。

sense_info_list.en: cause someone to learn or understand something by example or experience
to persuade sb not to do sth again by making them suffer so much that they are afraid to do it
encourage someone to accept something as a fact or principle

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 可教的；能教会的；适于教学的；便于讲授的；能传授的
n. 教学工作；教职；教学；讲授；教导；学说；教义
n. 教师；老师；先生；导师；教员

word_family.mean: v. 教；教会；教书；讲授；提倡；宣扬；训导；当教师；诱导；使明白

sense_info_list.en: show or explain to someone how to do something

examination_example.sentence: It has partnered with DIY website iFixit to <highlight>teach</highlight> consumers how to repair their clothing, such as waterproof outerwear, at home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 巴塔哥尼亚 (Patagonia) 与 DIY 网站 iFixit 合作，让消费者学会在家里就可以修改防水外套等衣物。

examination_example.sentence: Instead, Hacker is pushing for more courses like the one he <highlight>teaches</highlight> at Queens College; Numeracy 101.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，哈克(Hacker)正在推动开设更多的课程，比如他在皇后学院教授的课程: Numeracy 101。

examination_example.sentence: Should we change the way math is <highlight>taught</highlight> in schools, or eliminate some courses entirely?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们应该改变学校的数学教学方式，还是完全取消一些课程？

word_usage.usage: teach sb. a lesson意为“教训某人”，属固定结构，其中a不可省略。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 可教的；能教会的；适于教学的；便于讲授的；能传授的
n. 教学工作；教职；教学；讲授；教导；学说；教义
n. 教师；老师；先生；导师；教员

word_family.mean: v. 教；教会；教书；讲授；提倡；宣扬；训导；当教师；诱导；使明白

sense_info_list.en: show or explain to someone how to do something

examination_example.sentence: Brent Ryan, who <highlight>teaches</highlight> urban design at MIT, says Songdo proves a universal principle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在麻省理工学院教授城市设计的 Brent Ryan 表示，松岛新城证实了一条放之四海而皆准的法则。

examination_example.sentence: They engage college undergraduates to <highlight>teach</highlight> computer science to high school students, who in turn instruct middle school students on the topic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们请大学本科生教授高中生计算机科学，然后再由高中生去指导初中生。

examination_example.sentence: While preparing to <highlight>teach</highlight>, they organize their knowledge and improve their own understanding.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在备课的同时，他们梳理知识，增进理解。

examination_example.sentence: While we <highlight>teach</highlight>, we learn.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们教学的过程也是学习的过程。

sense_info_list.en: to make somebody feel or think in a different way

examination_example.sentence: In this study, instead of teaching students that their smartness can change, we <highlight>taught</highlight> them that their social standing can change over time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们没有教导学生们聪明程度可以改变，而是教导他们社会地位会随着时间而改变。

word_usage.usage: teach sb. a lesson意为“教训某人”，属固定结构，其中a不可省略。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 教学工作；教职；教学；讲授；教导；学说；教义
n. 教师；老师；先生；导师；教员

word_family.mean: v. 教；教会；教书；讲授；提倡；宣扬；训导；当教师；诱导；使明白

examination_example.sentence: Back in 1978, I had to travel between three different campuses in the morning, <highlight>teaching</highlight> freshman composition.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 回到1978年，我不得不在早上穿梭于三个不同的校园之间，教新生作文。

examination_example.sentence: I've started a project to promote the <highlight>teaching</highlight> of the arts in our schools.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我已经启动了一个项目来促进我们学校的艺术教学。

examination_example.sentence: I held presentations at schools to <highlight>teach</highlight> kids about plastic waste.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我在学校举办讲座，教孩子们关于塑料垃圾的知识。

examination_example.sentence: Maurice Ashley was kind and smart, a former graduate returning to <highlight>teach</highlight>, and this jobwas no game for him; he meant business.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Maurice Ashley利善良又聪明，一个回来教书的前毕业生，而且这份工作对他来说不是消遣；他是认真的。

examination_example.sentence: I'm the <highlight>teaching</highlight> assistant for this lab session.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我是这次实验的助教。

examination_example.sentence: I stopped <highlight>teaching</highlight> and opened it up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我停止了教学，打开了它。

word_usage.usage:
teach可跟不定式的复合结构：
She taught her children to read and write.
她教她的孩子们看书和写字。

teach也可跟疑问词+不定式结构：
All this taught us how to deal with the enemy.
所有这些都教会了我们应该怎样对付敌人。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 教学工作；教职；教学；讲授；教导；学说；教义
n. 教师；老师；先生；导师；教员

word_family.mean: v. 教；教会；教书；讲授；提倡；宣扬；训导；当教师；诱导；使明白

sense_info_list.en: show or explain to someone how to do something

examination_example.sentence: We'll also have a special lesson from a guest cartoonist, who will <highlight>teach</highlight> us how to draw cartoons.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们还将有一节特别课程，授自一位客座漫画家，他将教我们如何画漫画。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Teach</highlight> a man to fish, and you feed him for a lifetime.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 授人以渔，喂养其一生。

examination_example.sentence: Gardening can be a great teacher to <highlight>teach</highlight> children about nature and healthy eating.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 园艺可以成为一个很好的老师，教孩子们关于自然和健康饮食的知识。

sense_info_list.en: cause someone to learn or understand something by example or experience

examination_example.sentence: I think my failure that term <highlight>taught</highlight> me just as much as my success.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想，我那学期的失败和我的成功一样教会了我很多。

examination_example.sentence: To thank her, I'd like to share some of the things she <highlight>taught</highlight> me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了感谢她，我想分享一些她教给我的东西。

examination_example.sentence: Their mother <highlight>taught</highlight> them to be helpful.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的母亲教导他们要乐于助人。

sense_info_list.en: encourage someone to accept something as a fact or principle

examination_example.sentence: Sometimes, you feel so angry that you really want to <highlight>teach</highlight> somebody a lesson.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时候，你感到太生气了，以致于你真的想给某人一个教训。

word_usage.usage: teach sb. a lesson意为“教训某人”，属固定结构，其中a不可省略。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 最普通用词，含义广泛。指直接教某人知识或技能等，侧重传播知识和帮助应用知识。
指对体育运动、工作、技能等进行培训或进行考前辅导。
指培训人或动物的某种技能或进行体育训练。
